pull.title: Break circular dependency: chain -> pow -> chain
pull.body:
chain.h does not actually depend on the methods defined in pow.h, just its
include of consensus/params.h, which is standalone and can be included instead.

Confirmed by inspection and successful build.

events.body: Tested ACK 53dd65a, circular dependency is removed.

verification.payload:
tree 9d602a85eb9cfb6c687ce336dcaa0e147e941c2c

author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1526279993 -0700
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1526348199 -0700

Break circular dependency: chain -> pow -> chain

chain.h does not actually depend on the methods defined in pow.h, just its
include of consensus/params.h, which is standalone and can be included instead.

Confirmed by inspection and successful build.

events.message:
Break circular dependency: chain -> pow -> chain

chain.h does not actually depend on the methods defined in pow.h, just its
include of consensus/params.h, which is standalone and can be included instead.

Confirmed by inspection and successful build.

events.body: It compiles and tests pass ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13234/commits/5b35b9276858f6841ab4b688883461f602e9f937

utACK 5b35b9276858f6841ab4b688883461f602e9f937

Very nice! Thanks for tackling this.
